assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: T.N. is part of the scientific advisory board on LHON genetics Chiesi GmbH. The other authors have no relevant financial or non-financial interests to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was performed in line with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki. Approval was granted by the responsible ethics committee of the Heinrich Heine University.

group.label: Consent to participate and to publish
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Freely given, informed consent was obtained from all individuals or their legal guardians as required by the Institutional Review Board (IRB) and explicit and separate permission for the publication of photographs or images of individuals was obtained.
